      • checkForOverlappingAppointments

        public static boolean checkForOverlappingAppointments​(java.lang.String appointmentStartDate,
                                                      java.lang.String appointmentStartTime,
                                                      java.lang.String appointmentEndDate,
                                                      java.lang.String appointmentEndTime,
                                                      int appointmentID)
        Method ensures that there are no overlapping appointments
        Parameters:
        appointmentStartDate - - start date of the appointment
        appointmentStartTime - - start time of the appointment
        appointmentEndDate - - end date of the appointment
        appointmentEndTime - - end time of the appointment
        appointmentID - - appointment ID
        Returns:
        - true if there are no overlapping appointments
